Dark Cathedral.description: Once was a blessed place, only caos now.

The Upside Down.description: Run! this place is not safe.

Cemitery.description: This is an old cemitery where warriors lost their lives in past. Beware of your enemies.

Alegrete Town.description: Take a rest, you are safe.
